articles.author: Liz Napolitano, Pia Singh
articles.title: Dow drops 400 points, giving up earlier gain on concern about bad loans in banking industry: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: Investors turned their attention to strong tech-related earnings on Thursday but continued to monitor the China trade situation.
articles.content:
Stocks fell Thursday, giving up earlier gains, led by declines in bank stocks on worries about bad loans. Traders also juggled persistent trade tensions and an ongoing U.S. government shutdown.

articles.author: Rebecca Bellan
articles.title: Apple loses another AI exec to Meta - TechCrunch
articles.description: Yang’s departure marks the latest in a string of exits from Apple’s AI unit, putting the company into jeopardy in the lead-up to a much-anticipated Siri revamp scheduled for March.
articles.content:
Ke Yang, the Apple executive leading the iPhone maker’s efforts to build AI-driven web search, is heading to Meta, according to a Bloomberg report.
